name: Pokedex
description: The Pokédex is a SvelteKit & SCSS web application, hosted on Vercel, that consumes and caches the Pokémon API to display all Pokémon information. Gotta catch them all!

name: Ultimate Todos
description: Ultimate Todos is a Full Stack Next.js, Sveltekit application that allows users to create a todo list in the style of a kanban board. Features a fully drag and droppable interface and showcases the new Svelte 5 runes.

name: React portfolio
description: A sample portfolio site utilizing React instead of Sveltekit. Utilizes Sanity CMS to display data and showcases higher order components

name: Link Tree clone
description: Clone tree is a Full Stack CRUD application utilizing Sveltekit, Firebase, Tailwind CSS and daisyUI to create a web app that allows users to create accounts linked to their gmail account and share all their social media links.
